basics.name: MANGO
basics.label: Full Stack Developer | UI/UX Designer
basics.summary: Full Stack Developer with a background in graphic design and digital interfaces. Specialized turning Figma designs into fully functional products.

about.title: About
about.content: I am a Full Stack Developer and UI/UX Designer with over 8 years of experience in creative projects. I am passionate about building intuitive, functional, and visually appealing web applications. I have a strong background in both front-end and back-end development, as well as experience in design and project management. I am a team player who is always eager to learn and take on new challenges.
